markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Ethereal](/Traits.aspx?ID=63)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 631 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Ethereal creatures are natives of the [Ethereal Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=9). They can survive the basic environmental effects of the Ethereal Plane.
name: Ethereal
